name: Out of Controhl
description:
WASD to move, Space Bar to attack

A doggo on his way to boxing practice decides to pick up a copy of Rhemedy Entehrtainment's critically acclaimed video game, Controhl........

Credits:

Developed by 3E, a small team of friends

Big Thanks to Pixel Pete, Brackeys, BlackThornProd, Family & Friends

Music and sounds made by team. Some Graphics made by team.

Additional Assets used:

CanariPack 8BIT TopDown https://canarigames.itch.io/canaripack-8bit-topdown

Small Indoor Tileset https://pyxelyzr.itch.io/16x16-small-indoor-tileset

Tools Used:

Game Engine - Unity 2019

Graphics - Aseprite

Music - Bosca Ceoil

Sound Effects - BFXR
